title: Military property; loss, damage, destruction, or wrongful disposition
context: [ยง124A-142] Military property; loss, damage, destruction, or wrongful disposition. Any person subject to this chapter who, without proper authority: (1) Sells or otherwise disposes of; (2) Wilfully or through neglect damages, destroys, or loses; or (3) Wilfully or through neglect suffers to be damaged, destroyed, sold, or wrongfully disposed of; any military property of the United States or of the State shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2] Revision Note &ldquo;Or&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;of&rdquo; in section heading.
